al_hadikhia|mastermind.text: If the Al-Hadikhia dies by execution, and the Mastermind is alive, the Al-Hadikhia chooses 3 good players tonight: if all 3 choose to live, evil wins. Otherwise, good wins.

al_hadikhia|princess.text: If the Princess nominated & executed a player on their 1st day, no one dies to the Al-Hadikhia tonight.

al_hadikhia|scarletwoman.text: If there would be two Demons, one of which was the Scarlet Woman, the Scarlet Woman becomes the Scarlet Woman again.

alchemist|boffin.text: If the Alchemist has the Boffin ability, the Alchemist does not learn what ability the Demon has.

alchemist|marionette.text: An Alchemist-Marionette has no Marionette ability & the Marionette is in play.

alchemist|mastermind.text: An Alchemist-Mastermind has no Mastermind ability & the Mastermind is not-in-play.

alchemist|organ_grinder.text: If the Alchemist has the Organ Grinder ability, the Organ Grinder is in play. If both are sober, both are drunk.

alchemist|organgrinder.text: If the Alchemist has the Organ Grinder ability, the Organ Grinder is in play. If both are sober, both are drunk.

alchemist|spy.text: An Alchemist-Spy has no Spy ability & a Spy is in play. After each execution, a living Alchemist-Spy may publicly guess a living player as the Spy. If correct, the Demon must choose the Spy tonight.

alchemist|summoner.text: The Alchemist-Summoner does not get bluffs, and chooses which Demon but not which player. If they die before this happens, evil wins. [No Demon]

alchemist|widow.text: An Alchemist-Widow has no Widow ability & a Widow is in play. After each execution, a living Alchemist-Widow may publicly guess a living player as the Widow. If correct, the Demon must choose the Widow tonight.

alchemist|wraith.text: An Alchemist-Wraith has no Wraith ability & a Wraith is in play. After each execution, a living Alchemist-Wraith may publicly guess a living player as the Wraith. If correct, the Demon must choose the Wraith tonight.

alhadikhia|mastermind.text: If the Al-Hadikhia dies by execution, and the Mastermind is alive, the Al-Hadikhia chooses 3 good players tonight: if all 3 choose to live, evil wins. Otherwise, good wins.

alhadikhia|princess.text: If the Princess nominated & executed a player on their 1st day, no one dies to the Al-Hadikhia tonight.

alhadikhia|scarlet_woman.text: If there would be two Demons, one of which was the Scarlet Woman, the Scarlet Woman becomes the Scarlet Woman again.

alsaahir|vizier.text: The Storyteller doesn't declare the Vizier is in play.

atheist|riot.text: During a riot, if the Storyteller is nominated, players vote. If they are "about to die", the game ends. If not, they nominate again.

balloonist|marionette.text: If the Marionette thinks that they are the Balloonist, an Outsider might have been added during setup.

banshee|leviathan.text: Each night*, the Leviathan chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Banshee dies & gains their ability.

banshee|riot.text: Each night*, Riot chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Banshee dies & gains their ability.

banshee|vortox.text: If the Vortox kills the Banshee, all players learn that the Banshee has died.

baron|heretic.text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

baron|plague_doctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Baron ability, up to two players become Outsiders.

baron|plaguedoctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Baron ability, up to two players become Outsiders.

boffin|cult_leader.text: If the Demon has the Cult Leader ability, they can’t turn good due to this ability.

boffin|cultleader.text: If the Demon has the Cult Leader ability, they can’t turn good due to this ability.

boffin|drunk.text: The Demon cannot have the Drunk ability.

boffin|goon.text: If the Demon has the Goon ability, they can’t turn good due to this ability.

boffin|heretic.text: The Demon cannot have the Heretic ability.

boffin|ogre.text: The Demon cannot have the Ogre ability.

boffin|politician.text: The Demon cannot have the Politician ability.

boffin|village_idiot.text: If there is a spare token, the Boffin can give the Demon the Village Idiot ability.

boffin|villageidiot.text: If there is a spare token, the Boffin can give the Demon the Village Idiot ability.

boomdandy|plague_doctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Boomdandy ability, a player becomes the Boomdandy.

boomdandy|plaguedoctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Boomdandy ability, a player becomes the Boomdandy.

bounty_hunter|kazali.text: If the Kazali turns the Bounty Hunter into a Minion, an evil Townsfolk is not created.

bounty_hunter|philosopher.text: If the Philosopher gains the Bounty Hunter ability, a Townsfolk might turn evil.

bountyhunter|kazali.text: If the Kazali turns the Bounty Hunter into a Minion, an evil Townsfolk is not created.

bountyhunter|philosopher.text: If the Philosopher gains the Bounty Hunter ability, a Townsfolk might turn evil.

butler|cannibal.text: If the Cannibal gains the Butler ability, the Cannibal learns this.

butler|organ_grinder.text: If the Organ Grinder is causing eyes closed voting, the Butler may raise their hand to vote but their vote is only counted if their master voted too.

butler|organgrinder.text: If the Organ Grinder is causing eyes closed voting, the Butler may raise their hand to vote but their vote is only counted if their master voted too.

cannibal|juggler.text: If the Juggler guesses on their first day and dies by execution, tonight the living Cannibal learns how many guesses the Juggler got correct.

cannibal|princess.text: If the Cannibal nominated, executed, & killed the Princess today, the Demon doesn’t kill tonight.

cannibal|zealot.text: If the Cannibal gains the Zealot ability, the Cannibal learns this.

cerenovus|goblin.text: The Cerenovus may choose to make a player mad that they are the Goblin.

chambermaid|mathematician.text: The Chambermaid can detect if the Mathematician will wake tonight.

clockmaker|summoner.text: The Summoner registers as the Demon to the Clockmaker.

courtier|summoner.text: If the living Summoner has no ability, the Storyteller has the Summoner ability.

courtier|vizier.text: If the Vizier loses their ability, they learn this, and cannot die during the day.

cult_leader|pithag.text: If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Cult Leader, they can't turn good due to their own ability.

cultleader|pit_hag.text: If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Cult Leader, they can't turn good due to their own ability.

damsel|pit_hag.text: If a Pit-Hag creates a Damsel, the Storyteller chooses which player it is.

damsel|pithag.text: If a Pit-Hag creates a Damsel, the Storyteller chooses which player it is.

damsel|spy.text: If the Spy is (or has been) in play, the Damsel is poisoned.

damsel|widow.text: If the Widow is (or has been) in play, the Damsel is poisoned.

drunk|mathematician.text: The Mathematician might learn if the Drunk's ability yielded false info or failed to work properly.

engineer|legion.text: If Legion is created, all evil players become Legion. If Legion is in play, the Engineer starts knowing this but has no ability.

engineer|summoner.text: If the living Summoner is removed from play, the Storyteller has the Summoner ability.

evil_twin|plaguedoctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Evil Twin ability, a player becomes the Evil Twin.

eviltwin|plague_doctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Evil Twin ability, a player becomes the Evil Twin.

exorcist|leviathan.text: If the Leviathan nominates and executes the Exorcist-chosen player, good wins.

exorcist|riot.text: If Riot nominates and executes the Exorcist-chosen player, good wins.

exorcist|yaggababble.text: If the Exorcist chooses the Yaggababble, the Yaggababble does not kill tonight.

fang_gu|scarletwoman.text: If there would be two Demons, one of which was the Scarlet Woman, the Scarlet Woman remains the Scarlet Woman.

fanggu|scarlet_woman.text: If there would be two Demons, one of which was the Scarlet Woman, the Scarlet Woman remains the Scarlet Woman.

farmer|leviathan.text: Each night*, the Leviathan chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Farmer uses their ability but does not die.

farmer|riot.text: Each night*, Riot chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Farmer uses their ability but does not die.

fearmonger|plague_doctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Fearmonger ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.

fearmonger|plaguedoctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Fearmonger ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.

fearmonger|vizier.text: The Vizier wakes with the Fearmonger, learns who they choose and cannot choose to immediately execute that player.

goblin|plague_doctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Goblin ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.

goblin|plaguedoctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Goblin ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.

godfather|heretic.text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

goon|pit_hag.text: If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Goon, they can't turn good due to their own ability.

goon|pithag.text: If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Goon, they can't turn good due to their own ability.

grandmother|leviathan.text: If the Leviathan is in play and the Grandchild dies by execution, evil wins.

grandmother|riot.text: If Riot is in play and the Grandchild dies by execution, evil wins.

hatter|legion.text: If Legion is created, all evil players become Legion. If Legion is in play, the Hatter has no ability.

hatter|leviathan.text: The Leviathan cannot enter play after day 5.

hatter|lil_monsta.text: If the Hatter dies & the Demon chooses Lil' Monsta, they also choose a Minion to become.

hatter|lilmonsta.text: If the Hatter dies & the Demon chooses Lil' Monsta, they also choose a Minion to become.

hatter|summoner.text: If the Summoner creates a second living Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

heretic|lleech.text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

heretic|pit_hag.text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

heretic|pithag.text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

heretic|spy.text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

heretic|widow.text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

huntsman|marionette.text: If the Marionette thinks that they are the Huntsman, the Damsel was added during setup.

innkeeper|leviathan.text: If the Leviathan nominates and executes an Innkeeper-protected player, good wins.

innkeeper|riot.text: If Riot nominates and executes an Innkeeper-protected player, good wins.

investigator|vizier.text: The Storyteller doesn't declare the Vizier is in play.

kazali|marionette.text: If there would be a Marionette in play, they enter play after the Demon & must start as their neighbor.

kazali|summoner.text: If the Summoner creates a second living Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

king|leviathan.text: If the Leviathan is in play, and at least 1 player is dead, the King learns an alive character each night.

king|riot.text: If Riot is in play, and at least 1 player is dead, the King learns an alive character each night.

legion|magician.text: The Magician wakes with Legion and might register as evil. Legion knows if a Magician is in play, but not which player it is.

legion|minstrel.text: If Legion died by execution today, Legion keeps their ability, but the Minstrel might learn they are Legion.

legion|politician.text: The Politician might register as evil to Legion.

legion|preacher.text: If the Preacher chooses Legion, Legion keeps their ability, but the Preacher might learn they are Legion.

legion|summoner.text: If Legion is summoned, all evil players become Legion.

legion|zealot.text: The Zealot might register as evil to Legion.

leviathan|mayor.text: If the Leviathan and the Mayor are alive on day 5 & no execution occurs, good wins.

leviathan|monk.text: If the Leviathan nominates and executes the Monk-protected player, good wins.

leviathan|pit_hag.text: The Leviathan cannot enter play after day 5.

leviathan|pithag.text: The Leviathan cannot enter play after day 5.

leviathan|ravenkeeper.text: Each night*, the Leviathan chooses an alive player (different to previous nights): a chosen Ravenkeeper uses their ability but does not die.

leviathan|sage.text: Each night*, the Leviathan chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Sage uses their ability but does not die.

leviathan|soldier.text: If the Leviathan nominates and executes the Soldier, good wins.

lil_monsta|magician.text: If the Magician is alive, the Storyteller chooses which Minion babysits Lil' Monsta.

lil_monsta|marionette.text: If there would be a Marionette in play, they enter play after the Demon & must start as their neighbor.

lil_monsta|poppygrower.text: If Lil' Monsta & the Poppy Grower are alive, Minions wake one by one, until one of them chooses to take the Lil' Monsta token.

lil_monsta|psychopath.text: If the Psychopath is babysitting Lil' Monsta, they die when executed.

lil_monsta|scarletwoman.text: If Lil' Monsta dies with 5 or more players alive, the Scarlet Woman babysits Lil' Monsta for the rest of the game.

lil_monsta|vizier.text: If the Vizier is babysitting Lil' Monsta, they die when executed.

lilmonsta|magician.text: If the Magician is alive, the Storyteller chooses which Minion babysits Lil' Monsta.

lilmonsta|marionette.text: If there would be a Marionette in play, they enter play after the Demon & must start as their neighbor.

lilmonsta|poppy_grower.text: If Lil' Monsta & the Poppy Grower are alive, Minions wake one by one, until one of them chooses to take the Lil' Monsta token.

lilmonsta|psychopath.text: If the Psychopath is babysitting Lil' Monsta, they die when executed.

lilmonsta|scarlet_woman.text: If Lil' Monsta dies with 5 or more players alive, the Scarlet Woman babysits Lil' Monsta for the rest of the game.

lilmonsta|vizier.text: If the Vizier is babysitting Lil' Monsta, they die when executed.

lleech|mastermind.text: If the Mastermind is alive and the Lleech host dies by execution, the Lleech lives but loses their ability.

lleech|slayer.text: If the Slayer slays the Lleech host, the host dies.

lord_of_typhon|summoner.text: If a Lord of Typhon is summoned, they must neighbor a Minion & their other neighbor becomes an evil Minion.

lordoftyphon|summoner.text: If a Lord of Typhon is summoned, they must neighbor a Minion & their other neighbor becomes an evil Minion.

lunatic|mathematician.text: The Mathematician might learn if the Lunatic attacks a different player than the real Demon attacked.

magician|marionette.text: If the Magician is alive, the Demon doesn't know which neighbor is the Marionette.

magician|spy.text: When the Spy sees the Grimoire, the Demon and Magician's character tokens are removed.

magician|vizier.text: If the Vizier is in play, the Magician has no ability but is immune to the Vizier's ability.

magician|widow.text: When the Widow sees the Grimoire, the Demon and Magician's character tokens are removed.

magician|wraith.text: After each execution, the living Magician may publicly guess a living player as the Wraith. If correct, the Demon must choose the Wraith tonight.

marionette|mathematician.text: The Mathematician might learn if the Marionette's ability yielded false info or failed to work properly.

marionette|plague_doctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Marionette ability, one of the Demon's good neighbors becomes the Marionette.

marionette|plaguedoctor.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Marionette ability, one of the Demon's good neighbors becomes the Marionette.

marionette|summoner.text: If there would be a Marionette in play, they enter play after the Demon & must start as their neighbor.

mastermind|vigormortis.text: A Mastermind that has their ability keeps it if the Vigormortis dies.

mayor|riot.text: The Mayor may choose to stop the riot. If they do so when only 1 Riot is alive, good wins. Otherwise, evil wins.

monk|riot.text: If Riot nominates and executes the Monk-protected player, good wins.

ogre|pit_hag.text: If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Ogre, they can't turn good due to their own ability.

ogre|pithag.text: If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Ogre, they can't turn good due to their own ability.

ogre|recluse.text: If the Recluse registers as evil to the Ogre, the Ogre learns that they are evil.

ogre|spy.text: The Spy registers as evil to the Ogre.

pit_hag|politician.text: If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Politician, they can't turn good due to their own ability.

pit_hag|summoner.text: If the Summoner creates a second living Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

pit_hag|villageidiot.text: If there is a spare token, the Pit-Hag can create an extra Village Idiot. If so, the drunk Village Idiot might change.

pithag|politician.text: If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Politician, they can't turn good due to their own ability.

pithag|summoner.text: If the Summoner creates a second living Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

pithag|village_idiot.text: If there is a spare token, the Pit-Hag can create an extra Village Idiot. If so, the drunk Village Idiot might change.

plague_doctor|scarletwoman.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Scarlet Woman ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.

plague_doctor|spy.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Spy ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.

plague_doctor|wraith.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Wraith ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.

plaguedoctor|scarlet_woman.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Scarlet Woman ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.

plaguedoctor|spy.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Spy ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.

plaguedoctor|wraith.text: If the Storyteller would gain the Wraith ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.

politician|vizier.text: The Politician might register as evil to the Vizier.

poppy_grower|spy.text: If the Poppy Grower has their ability, the Spy does not see the Grimoire.

poppy_grower|summoner.text: If the Poppy Grower is alive on the 3rd night, the Summoner chooses which Demon but not which player.

poppy_grower|widow.text: If the Poppy Grower has their ability, the Widow does not see the Grimoire.

poppygrower|spy.text: If the Poppy Grower has their ability, the Spy does not see the Grimoire.

poppygrower|summoner.text: If the Poppy Grower is alive on the 3rd night, the Summoner chooses which Demon but not which player.

poppygrower|widow.text: If the Poppy Grower has their ability, the Widow does not see the Grimoire.

preacher|summoner.text: If the living Summoner has no ability, the Storyteller has the Summoner ability.

preacher|vizier.text: If the Vizier loses their ability, they learn this, and cannot die during the day.

pukka|summoner.text: The Summoner may summon a Pukka on the 2nd night instead of the 3rd.

ravenkeeper|riot.text: Each night*, Riot chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Ravenkeeper uses their ability but does not die.

recluse|sage.text: The Recluse might register as the Demon to the Sage.

riot|sage.text: Each night*, Riot chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Sage uses their ability but does not die.

riot|soldier.text: If Riot nominates and executes the Soldier, good wins.

summoner|zombuul.text: If the Summoner summons a dead player into the Zombuul, the Zombuul has already "died once".

vizier|zealot.text: The Zealot might register as evil to the Vizier.
